title: What is behind the big tech companies' job cuts?
description: Thousands of redundancies have been announced by some of the largest firms in the industry.

title: Watch parties get a privacy focus with BBC trial
description: Individual users will be able to decide how much personal data they want to share with the service.

title: MrBeast overtakes PewDiePie as most-subscribed YouTuber
description: PewDiePie's almost 10 years of dominance have come to an end, as MrBeast reaches 112 million subscribers.

title: Nvidia investigates melting graphics card cable reports
description: Social-media users share photos appearing to show damage to the cable supplied with the Nvidia RTX 4090.

title: Deliveroo: UK-based food delivery firm quits Australia
description: The firm struggled to compete with rivals as well as facing pressure to improve workers' conditions.

title: Amazon staff laid off as tech giants cut costs, according to LinkedIn posts
description: This week it was reported that the firm is planning to cut 10,000 jobs, around 3% of its office staff.

title: Byjus, Meta, Twitter: India tech workers fight back amid mass layoffs
description: Many young Indians who've lost their jobs are looking for ways to air their frustration and build support.
